name: White Hole
description:
or will it get destroyed once and for all? That’s all up to you!

Gameplay
  • Forge
  • Discover
  • Solve

This game has a different gameplay for Oculus Rift and Oculus Quest. In the Oculus Quest thanks to the hand-tracking technology, you can just pinch objects to move them in a much more organic way!

Guardian

White Hole uses the guardian system to build your ship, you need to use a roomscale guardian in order to play the game. The game is made to work with a 2*2 meter safe zone, you can play with a smaller guardian but you won't have enough place for all the ship components.

You have 2 options for your spaceship set-up. You can either trust your drawing skills and draw your personalised Guardian and have exactly that as a spaceship or you can like straight lines and choose a cubic spaceship.
